views.label: Overview
views.prompt: Run /wicked-mem:stats and show memory statistics. Display total count, breakdown by type (episodic, procedural, decision, semantic, working) as a bar chart, and list the 10 most recent memories as cards with their type, importance, and a preview of content.

views.label: Browse
views.prompt: Run /wicked-mem:recall to list all memories. Show them as a searchable table with columns: type, content preview (first 100 chars), importance (1-5 stars), tags, and created date. Allow filtering by type.

views.label: Decisions
views.prompt: Run /wicked-mem:recall --type decision to show all decision memories. Display each as a card with the decision title, rationale, date, and importance level. Group by tags if available.

actions.label: Store Memory
actions.prompt: Ask the user what they want to remember, then use /wicked-mem:store to save it.

actions.label: Search Memories
actions.prompt: Ask the user what they want to recall, then use /wicked-mem:recall with their query.
